about_the_game:
CREATURES is an innovative music tech game that combines the excitement of a TPS-style Battle Royale with a surreal atmosphere and exclusive music from top artists. Choose from a variety of unique characters and explore landscapes filled with hidden weapons and hiding spots. Play as different characters and traverse different spaces as you engage in thrilling battles.



The game features a growing selection of environments and a range of characters from different communities, each with their own strengths and weaknesses. Discover new music from your favorite artists as you progress through the game, and unlock exclusive content as you climb the leaderboard.



In CREATURES, gameplay revolves around intense battles in a variety of unique settings. With a focus on music, this game is perfect for players who want to enjoy entertainment in a new immersive way.



CREATURES is a game that transports players to a surreal atmosphere where they can defeat enemies and listen to unique music. The game offers an engaging and unique gameplay experience that combines competition and music. Whether you're a music lover or a hardcore gamer, CREATURES promises to provide a fun and exciting challenge for players. With its unique strategies and tactics, players can fully immerse themselves in the game and enjoy the surreal world.

short_description: Creatures is a multi-player that adds a gaming layer to music. Based around the pioneering artist BillyRacxx, we're creating a world where his fans can game and enjoy unique music that will constantly be updated.
